View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.mysql;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
7   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
8   
9   import java.util.Collections;
10  import java.util.List;
11  import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
12  
13  class MySqlReadFileLampSuiteIT extends ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT {
14  
15      @Override
16      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
17          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
18          this.injectionModel = model;
19  
20          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
21  
22          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initQueryString(
23              "http://jsql-lamp:8079/php/get-pdo.php?id="
24          );
25  
26          model.setIsScanning(true);
27  
28          model
29          .getMediatorUtils()
30          .getConnectionUtil()
31          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
32          .withTypeRequest("GET");
33  
34          model
35          .getMediatorUtils()
36          .getPreferencesUtil()
37          .withIsStrategyBlindBitDisabled(true)
38          .withIsStrategyBlindBinDisabled(true)
39          .withIsStrategyTimeDisabled(true)
40          .withIsStrategyStackDisabled(true)
41          .withIsStrategyMultibitDisabled(true)
42          .withIsStrategyErrorDisabled(true)
43          .withIsStrategyDnsDisabled(true);
44  
45          model.beginInjection();
46      }
47  
48      @RetryingTest(3)
49      public void readFile() throws JSqlException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
50          List<String> contents = this.injectionModel.getResourceAccess().readFile(
51              Collections.singletonList("/var/www/html/php/get-pdo.php")
52          );
53          LOGGER.info("ReadFile: found {}, to find {}", String.join(",", contents).trim(), "<?php");
54          Assertions.assertTrue(String.join(",", contents).trim().contains("<?php"));
55      }
56  }
